features.title: Why Choose Our Platform

dashboard.studentWelcomeMessage: Continue your learning journey and track your progress
dashboard.instructorWelcomeMessage: Manage your courses and track your teaching success
dashboard.analyticsDescription: Track your course performance and student engagement
dashboard.studentsDescription: Manage your students and their progress

settings.manageAccount: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.avatarRequirements: JPG, PNG or GIF. Max size 2MB.
settings.updateError: Failed to update. Please try again.
settings.passwordDescription: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
settings.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.authenticatorDescription: Use an authenticator app to generate verification codes
settings.notificationDescription: Choose what notifications you want to receive
settings.pushNotificationsDesc: Receive push notifications in your browser
settings.marketingEmailsDesc: Receive emails about new features and courses
settings.courseUpdatesDesc: Get notified when your enrolled courses are updated
settings.billingDescription: Manage your billing information and subscription
settings.stripeIntegration: Stripe integration will be available here
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
